materials: Book: Book: Little Red Riding Hood

lessonOutcomes.outcome: Students can follow along in their storybooks, read aloud with others, and use role-play to show understanding of the story and its alternative endings.
Students can share their predictions and preferences with confidence, express creative ideas through role-play, and discuss how characters might feel in different versions of the story.
Students can compare two different endings and explain the lesson or value they learn from each one, making connections to their own experiences.
